extendedInfo.description: Enter Painting square footage to calculate gallon coverage or add up square footage by walls or room. This will tell you how many gallons of paint you need for your next paint job. Save your Interior and Exterior Painting Estimates, Invoices, Customers, and Jobs. Save your Item Prices in settings and add up your painting estimate. Estimates and Invoices can be sent by email directly from app. also add up individual areas to get total square footage. Make your next paint job easier.

reviews.title: Too little, even for free
reviews.comment: I need to be able to add together each wall separately, then multiply by height.
reviews.author: Julianna Merwin

reviews.title: Needs some tweeking
reviews.comment: Instead of letting me create different sections for work but only showing the first 7 when I go to create a new estimate.. how about allow me to use all of them I set up.. fix this and make a delete button for estimates saved and I will gladly give 5 stars!!! Awesome idea tho.. very useful.  :-)
reviews.author: Jennie Suggs

reviews.title: Froze on my first sample estimate.
reviews.comment: Good luck to you. I\'m uninstalling.
reviews.author: David Amoroso

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: All it does is calculate some dollars, I need the number of gallons
reviews.author: don payne
